subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Box 12
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
------=_NextPart_000_37f1_70b5_2193
Content-Type: text/plain; format=flowed

I replaced the tuner in #12 with seperate AM and FM tuners tonight. I still 
still need to rework the White Noise amp, but it's harder to get to being on 
the underside of the board. This one is battery powered.

There's enough people wanting boxes that who to give them to without dissing 
anyone is a problem. These are the same as all the others I've given away. 
They were made as proto types to test ideas, mostly different ways of 
construction, after they are built, I always want to move on tho other 
ideas.


Frank
